name: Limit of Integral of Positive Continuous Function

Hypothesis.Statement: The limit $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(\int_{0}^{1} f(x)^{n} d x\right)^{1 / n}$ exists.

Missing.Statement: Show that  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(\int_{0}^{1} f(x)^{n} d x\right)^{1 / n} \le M$.
Show that  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(\int_{0}^{1} f(x)^{n} d x\right)^{1 / n} \ge M$.
